links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack

wikitext.*:
'''Lothlórien''' may refer to:
==Middle-earth==
* The '''Kingdom of [[Lothlórien]]''' in [[Middle-earth]], often referred to as ''Lórien''.
** [[Galadhrim|Elves of Lórien]], the Silvan Elves - or ''Galadhrim'' - who lived there.
** [[King of Lórien]], the former title of the rulers of Lothlórien.
** [[Lord and Lady of Lórien]], the titles taken by [[Celeborn]] and [[Galadriel]].

==Books==
* ''[[Lothlórien (chapter)]]'', the eighteenth chapter of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
* ''[[Lothlórien (The Treason of Isengard)]]'', the twelfth chapter of ''[[The Treason of Isengard]]''.
==Adaptations==
* ''[[Lothlórien (scene)]]'', the thirty-seventh scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
* "[[Lothlórien (soundtrack)]]", a track on ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]''.
* "[[Lothlórien (musical)]]", a track from ''[[The Lord of the Rings (musical)]]'' by [[A.R. Rahman]].
==Popular media==
===Bands===
* [[Lothlórien (band)]], an Australian band.
* [[Lothlöryen]], a Brazilian band.
===Albums===
* "[[Lothlórien (Lórien album)]]", a [[1998]] album by [[Lórien (Polish band)]].
* "[[Lothlórien (Uruk-hai album)]]", a [[2006]] album by [[Uruk-hai (band)]].
===Songs===
* "[[Lothlórien (Argent song)]]", a [[1971]] song by [[Argent]].
* "[[Lothlorien (Hansson song)]]", track seven on [[Bo Hansson]]'s ''[[Sagan om Ringen (album)|Sagan om Ringen]]''.
* "[[Lothlórien (Enya song)]]" , a [[1991]] song by [[Enya]].
* "[[Lothlórien (Zip song)]]", a [[1995]] song by [[Zip]].
* "[[Lothlórien (Lothlórien song)]]", a [[1995]] song by [[Lothlórien (band)]].
* "[[Lothlórien (Arkenstone song)]]", a [[2001]] song by [[David Arkenstone]].
* "[[Lothlorien (Wakeman song)]]", a [[2001]] song by [[Rick Wakeman]].
* "[[Lothlorien (Mostly Autumn song)]]", a [[2001]] song by [[Mostly Autumn]].
* "[[Lothlorien (Lothlöryen song)]]", a [[2003]] song by [[Lothlöryen]].
* "[[Lothlorien "The Ream Of The Light"]], a [[2003]] song by [[Lugburz (Spanish band)]].
* "[[Lothlórien (Brobdingnagian Bards song)]]", a [[2005]] song by the [[Brobdingnagian Bards]].

==See also==
* [[Lórien (disambiguation)]]
